channel.title: Changing location
channel.description: Hey guys, how do I change the location of where my cache unzips, like atm it automatically unzips to C:/.haizscape_file_store_32/cache/, but I want it to extract to C:/.haizscape_file_store_32/ but Idk how to change that.

item.title: Changing location
item.dc:creator: @TormentedSoul TormentedSoul
item.description:
@TormentedSoul wrote:

As far as I am concerned if you look into your cachedownloader.java file or whatever you call it and search for C:\ I think you can change the destination of where to extract it to.

Read full topic
